column3:
@laanwj Can you please take a look and merge this, I have less motivation currently, as my old pulls seem all to be just ignored, even ones that are ACKd already.

See #3698, #3682 or #3603...

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cfe4cad9e5ad040a1dbfc14098628fa30aa87498 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
